text: kavurun (allahva) visvasa kara, dæhæmi kriyavanda kara, muhammad (nabi sallallahu aleyihi vasallam) namin pahala karanu læbu eya tamange deviyange sannidhanaye sita pæmini satya (dharmaya) yayi visvasa karamin sitiyoda, ovun (nodænuvatva kala) napuru kriyavan ovungen paha kara, ovunge tatvayada (deviyan honda atata harava) pilisakara kaleya
